title: AUC Honors Mohammad Al Gergawi, UAE Minister Of Cabinet Affairs With the Global Fellow Award | The American University in Cairo

quotes: November 28, 2024, Cairo – The American University in Cairo (AUC) welcomed His Excellency Mohammad bin Abdullah Al Gergawi, Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the United Arab Emirates, during a special visit to its campus.

organizations.name: The American University in Cairo (AUC)

organizations.name: Ministerial Development Council
quotes: His Excellency Mohammad Al Gergawi, alongside his role as Minister of Cabinet Affairs, holds several distinguished leadership positions. These include serving as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial Development Council, Chairman of the Executive Office in Dubai, Chairman of the World Government Summit, Vice Chairman of the Board of Trustees and Managing Director of the Dubai Future Foundation, Secretary-General of the

organizations.name: AUC Libraries
quotes: During the visit, Minister Al Gergawi toured key areas of the AUC campus, including the academic area, AUC Libraries, and the Center for Applied Research on the Environment and Sustainability (CARES).
